articles.content: The account indicated that people like Rep. Markwayne Mullin and Rep. Vern Buchanan each had more than $1 million in PPP loans forgiven in response to their comments calling the student loan forgiven… [+555 chars]

articles.author: Madison McGee
articles.title: 20 Things I Learned This Week That Are So Fascinating, I Truly Will Never Be Able To Forget Them
articles.description: The Beastie Boys actually coined the term "mullet" in 1994. While the hairstyle had been popular long before the band hit it big, their 1994 song "Mullet Head" was the first time a name was associated with the "business in the front, party in the back" look.
